reviewText: Among our favorite Christmas time movies!

I ABSOLUTELY ADORE this dvd. Something about it talks to my soul deep inside. Our family will treasure this story for a LIFETIME. If Faithcape-Animation makes another one, I want to be the FIRST in line to buy their dvd. The story line is SUPERB and the Animation  is Charming.
For those who are lonely at Christmas time, this will sooth your soul.

I would suggest you watch this movie on You Tube before purchasing. I did. The animation is not good, but I will always forgive that if it is written well. It's not. The grandfather of the two children is neglectful and verbally abusive and it's supposed to be funny??? One star only for the Christian theme, and the moral they tried unsuccessfully to portray. If you are looking for a good Christian Christmas movie, I would suggest The Very First Noel Christmas DVD

This is one of our favorite Christmas movies! The pictures are colorful, and the story is very meaningful. The plot, however, is slow, but it is really worth watching. We were reminded that the real meaning of Christmas is not about parties or money. Also, the length of the movie is just right at about 45 minutes.

This is a touching story about the true meaning of Christmas.  It presents the Gospel accurately and is very, very well made.  I would also highly recommend the story of Noah and the Pilgrim's Progress by Scott Cawthon.
